title: Ahaziah and Athaliah
summary: Ahaziah becomes king but follows evil influences, including his mother Athaliah. He is killed by Jehu. Athaliah then seizes power by killing the royal family—except Joash, who is hidden away.

faq.question: Who influenced Ahaziah to do evil?
faq.answer: His mother Athaliah and relatives from Ahab’s house.

faq.question: How did Joash survive Athaliah’s purge?
faq.answer: His aunt hid him in the temple for six years.
